item.title: Cabin Altitude Backup Sensor – (CPCS BACKUP SENS) System

remarks.para: May be inoperative provided both automatic cabin pressure controllers are operative.

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Verify status message CABIN ALT AUTO A or status message CABIN ALT AUTO B is not displayed.

placard.para: Placard "CPCS BACKUP SENS INOP" below Captain's PFD on P-1-1 panel. Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
